description: Bomberclone is a clone of the game AtomicBomberMan. The goal of the game is to bomb out your enemies. You can plant bombs to find a way through the maze and get in touch with the opponents. Special features will help you to win. The program has originally been developed by Steffen and is now ported by omoco to the webOS platform. You can play against up to 15 computer controlled players. You control your player with the keyboard or directly at the touchscreen. This is the first beta of the port and may contain some errors. If you find any bugs or have suggestions please mail me: bomberclone@omoco.de
